column5: Let you guys know, he was in and out they did the biopsy removed the tumor..... All in about 5 hours and we are home now! A Dr friend of ours is getting the results of the biopsy sooner for us otherwise they said it would be 2 weeks...... Thank you so much for the prayers and concern...... Now we wait for the next step......  Lorissa
That sounds like good news, hopefully the results are favourable and he is fully recovered in time for Bass opener!  Tony
sounds promising.  hope all goes well!
Good luck and prayers will continue!
Good news indeed. Thanks for the update.
Good to hear, I hope the results are also good news.  Maureen
Thinking of you and your hubby!!  Hope all turns out great...I'm sure it will.  Cliff & Carole
Good news, my thoughts and prayers with you and your family.  John
I hope everything works out, there will be a couple extra prayers for you tonight.  Jerry
I hope all goes well and make sure he gets lots of rest.
Another prayer comin' your way.  All the best as you wait the results and we continue to pray for the very best.   Keep us posted.
Great start Lorissa.  Prayers will continue!
